scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.compare: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const https=require('https'); const local=fs.readFileSync('dist/index.html','utf8'); const localJs=local.match(/index\.[a-f0-9]*\.js/)?.[0]||'none'; const localCss=local.match(/index\.[a-f0-9]*\.css/)?.[0]||'none'; console.log('本地版本:',localJs,localCss); https.get('https://no-trace.jp',(res)=>{let data=''; res.on('data',chunk=>data+=chunk); res.on('end',()=>{const prodJs=data.match(/index\.[a-f0-9]*\.js/)?.[0]||'none'; const prodCss=data.match(/index\.[a-f0-9]*\.css/)?.[0]||'none'; console.log('生产版本:',prodJs,prodCss); console.log('是否同步:',localJs===prodJs&&localCss===prodCss?'✅ 是':'❌ 否');});})"
